3.name: Narration
3.text:
The goblin's prized possession, the Goblin Tank,
explodes. Along with the grand flames, the
goblins' plan turns to ashes.

5.name: Adventurer
5.text: "I guess it's mostly taken care of..."

6.name: Eric
6.text:
"I looked around a bit, but... Hmm, something's
strange. The number of carriages and the amount of
luggage don't seem to match."

7.name: Adventurer
7.text:
"I see. It seems someone has already taken the
spoils and fled. For a goblin, it doesn't seem
like just simple looting."

8.name: Adventurer
8.text:
"I'd like to search and exterminate, but... we're
short on hands. Besides, right now we need to go
help them first."

9.name: Eric
9.text:
"I see... Reporting to the guild takes priority, I
suppose."

14.name: Peddler
14.text:
"Ah, ah... I'm sorry, thank goodness you're safe,
miss... No, that tail... is it from a dragon!?"

16.name: Peddler
16.text:
"Ohhh, how...!!! This is truly appreciated...! I
can't believe I'm still here...! Thank you so much
for saving me...!!"

17.name: Sol
17.text:
"Ehehe, you're welcome! But more importantly,
let's head to the village first!! 'It's safe to
let your guard down only after returning to a
secure place'! That's what Sensei taught me!"

21.name: Peddler
21.text:
"Oh, Sol-sama! Thank you so much for everything!!
Thanks to you, I was able to transport the cargo
safely...!!"

22.name: Peddler
22.text:
"I know it's not much of a thank-you, but please
accept this tribute...!!"

24.name: Peddler
24.text:
"And thanks to Sol-sama, I can resume my business!
If I find any rare items, I will definitely show
them to Sol-sama first! If you have time, please
come and visit!"

25.name: Eric
25.text:
"Hey, are you not going to give me that rare
find?"

36.name: Adventurer
36.text: "...! Is that a fire starting to blaze...?"

37.name: Adventurer
37.text:
"Hey, that's a carriage of a traveling merchant
heading towards Rukurea Village."

38.name: Adventurer
38.text: "The goblins, are they aiming for that...?!"
